                                                     java.lang.String path)
        Gets a string attribute from a json object given a path to traverse.
        Parameters:
        record - a JSONObject to traverse.
        path - the json path to follow.
        Returns:
        the attribute as a String, or null if it was not found.

        Parameters:

        path - the json path to follow.
        Returns:
